problem_names: lemma inf_K_S_next_behaviour: "(a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<and> s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t) \<Longrightarrow> (s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> t \<circ> b)"
lemma inf_K_next_behaviour: "a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<Longrightarrow> s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> b"
lemma inf_S_next_behaviour: "s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow> s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> t \<circ> a"
translations: lemma inf_K_S_next_behaviour: "(a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<and> s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t) \<Longrightarrow> (s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> t \<circ> b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<and> s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> t \<circ> b
unfolding Stimuli.leq_def CKA.leq_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
assume hyp: "a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t"

proof (state)
this:
  a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
hence "s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
hence "s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b
by (simp add: algebra_simps)

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
have "s \<circ> (a + b) = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> (a + b) = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> (a + b) = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b
  s \<circ> (a + b) = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b
have "s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> (a + b) + t \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b
  s \<circ> (a + b) = s \<circ> a + s \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> (a + b) + t \<circ> b
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> (a + b) + t \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
hence "s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> (a + b) + t \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b
by (simp add: hyp)

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
hence "s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = s \<circ> b + t \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
thus "s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = (s \<oplus> t) \<circ> b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b
by (simp add: hyp)

proof (state)
this:
  s \<circ> a + t \<circ> b = t \<circ> b

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma inf_K_S_next_stimulus: "a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<and> s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow> \<lambda>(s,a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda>(t,b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<and> s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (t, b)
unfolding Stimuli.leq_def CKA.leq_def

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
assume hyp: "a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t"

proof (state)
this:
  a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
hence "\<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b) = \<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(s\<oplus>t,b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s \<oplus> t, b)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s \<oplus> t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
hence "\<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b) = \<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(s,b) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s \<oplus> t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)
by (simp add: add_assoc)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
have "\<lambda>(s,a+b) = \<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(s,b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a + b) = \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a + b) = \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)
  \<lambda> (s, a + b) = \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b)
have "\<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b) = \<lambda>(s,a+b) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)
  \<lambda> (s, a + b) = \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (s, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
    \<lambda> (s, a + b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a + b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
hence "\<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b) = \<lambda>(s,b) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, a + b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
    \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)
by (simp add: hyp)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
hence "\<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b) = \<lambda>(s\<oplus>t,b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) =
  \<lambda> (s, b) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (s \<oplus> t, b)
by simp

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (s \<oplus> t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a + b = b \<and> s \<oplus> t = t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
thus "\<lambda>(s,a) \<oplus> \<lambda>(t,b) = \<lambda>(t,b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (s \<oplus> t, b)

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)
by (simp add: hyp)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a) \<oplus> \<lambda> (t, b) = \<lambda> (t, b)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed

text \<open>
The following lemmas show additional results from the axiomatisation of \CCKAabbrv which follow from lemmas \emph{inf-K-S-next-behaviour} and \emph{inf-K-S-next-stimulus}.
\<close>
lemma inf_K_next_behaviour: "a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<Longrightarrow> s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> b
by (simp add: inf_K_S_next_behaviour)
lemma inf_S_next_behaviour: "s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow> s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> t \<circ> a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow>
    s \<circ> a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> t \<circ> a
by (simp add: inf_K_S_next_behaviour)
lemma inf_add_seq_par_next_behaviour: "s \<circ> (a;b + b;a) \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> (a*b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> (a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> (a * b)
using inf_K_next_behaviour add_seq_inf_par

proof (prove)
using this:
  ?a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> ?b \<Longrightarrow>
  ?s \<circ> ?a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> ?s \<circ> ?b
  ?a ; ?b + ?b ; ?a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> ?a * ?b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> (a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> (a * b)
by blast
lemma inf_seqstar_parstar_next_behaviour: "s \<circ> a\<^sup>; \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> a\<^sup>*"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<circ> a\<^sup>; \<le>\<^sub>\<K> s \<circ> a\<^sup>*
by (simp add: seqstar_inf_parstar inf_K_next_behaviour)
lemma inf_S_next_stimulus: "s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow> \<lambda>(s,a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda>(t,a)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. s \<le>\<^sub>\<S> t \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (t, a)
by (simp add: inf_K_S_next_stimulus)
lemma inf_K_next_stimulus: "a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<Longrightarrow> \<lambda>(s,a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda>(s,b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b \<Longrightarrow>
    \<lambda> (s, a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, b)
by (simp add: inf_K_S_next_stimulus)
lemma inf_add_seq_par_next_stimulus: "\<lambda>(s, a;b + b;a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda>(s, a*b)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
proof -

proof (state)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
have "a;b \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a*b"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a ; b \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b
by (rule seq_inf_par)

proof (state)
this:
  a ; b \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
moreover

proof (state)
this:
  a ; b \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
have "b;a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b*a"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b * a
by (rule seq_inf_par)

proof (state)
this:
  b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b * a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
ultimately

proof (chain)
picking this:
  a ; b \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b
  b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b * a
have "a;b + b;a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a*b + b*a"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a ; b \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b
  b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> b * a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a ; b + b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b + b * a
by (simp add: add_mono)

proof (state)
this:
  a ; b + b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b + b * a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
hence "a;b + b;a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a*b"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a ; b + b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b + b * a

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. a ; b + b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b
by (simp add: par_comm)

proof (state)
this:
  a ; b + b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
thus "\<lambda>(s, a;b + b;a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda>(s, a*b)"

proof (prove)
using this:
  a ; b + b ; a \<le>\<^sub>\<K> a * b

goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)
by (rule inf_K_next_stimulus)

proof (state)
this:
  \<lambda> (s, a ; b + b ; a) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a * b)

goal:
No subgoals!
qed
lemma inf_seqstar_parstar_next_stimulus: "\<lambda>(s, a\<^sup>;) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda>(s, a\<^sup>*)"

proof (prove)
goal (1 subgoal):
 1. \<lambda> (s, a\<^sup>;) \<le>\<^sub>\<S> \<lambda> (s, a\<^sup>*)
by (simp add: seqstar_inf_parstar inf_K_next_stimulus)
end
end
